messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Unconventional family outings--a guide to help you plan your summer activities
messages.msgSnippet: This looks great,Thanks for the info ....Deb in Va
messages.messageBody:
This looks great,Thanks for the info ....Deb in Va

John O. Andersen wrote:
>
> Are you bored with theme parks, surf-n-sand, and other highly commercialized
> family outings? Are you tired of paying through the nose for pre-packaged
> and often superficial experiences? Do you believe that family fun and
> learning can go hand-in-hand? If so, here are some alternatives.
>
> http://go.to/unconventional Click on the "Unconventional Family Outings"
> link to view the revised, and much more user-friendly pages.
>
> Happy Memorial Day,
>
> John Andersen
>
> Message boards, timely articles, a free newsletter and more!
> Check it all out at: http://www.unschooling.com
>
> To Unsubscribe: mailto:Unschooling-dotcom-unsubscribe@onelist.com
